headline: PLDT (PSE:TEL) Declares Dividends Amid Q2 Revenue and Net Income Increase
summary: PLDT (PSE:TEL) recently announced second-quarter results showing an increase in revenue and net income, as well as declared regular and preferred cash dividends. Despite these positive financial results, the company's share price saw a 10% decline over the last quarter. This downturn can be contextualized by broader market trends, as major indices including the S&P 500 and Dow Jones also experienced retreats from record highs, particularly impacting tech stocks. Concurrently, PLDT is managing...

headline: Acquisitions Shaping Up Amphenol's Growth Trajectory: What's Ahead?
summary: APH's acquisitions fuel 52% revenue growth in H1 2025, while upcoming billion-dollar deals aim to expand its interconnect portfolio.
